titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 80) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2000, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-473, by Mr. Goss.

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 80 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Waives all points of order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 159.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 381.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/16/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.J. Res. 80 (continuing appropriations for FY 2000).
